title: post api auth register user registration
description: Test user registration with valid name email and password to ensure a new user is created and a JWT token is issued.

title: post api auth login user login
description: Test user login with valid email and password to verify successful authentication and receipt of JWT token.

title: get api auth me get current authenticated user
description: Test retrieval of current authenticated user details using a valid JWT token.

title: post api chat send message to ai chat
description: Test sending a message to the AI chat endpoint and verify the AI response, conversation id, and optional workflow generation.

title: get api workflows get all user workflows
description: Test fetching all workflows for the authenticated user to verify correct workflows are returned.

title: post api workflows create new workflow
description: Test creating a new workflow with valid name description trigger and steps to ensure workflow is saved correctly.

title: get api workflows id get specific workflow by id
description: Test retrieving a specific workflow by its id to verify correct workflow details are returned.

title: put api workflows id update workflow
description: Test updating an existing workflow with optional fields including name description trigger steps and enabled status.

title: delete api workflows id delete workflow
description: Test deleting a workflow by id to ensure the workflow is removed successfully.

title: post api workflows id execute manually execute workflow
description: Test manual execution of a workflow by id and verify execution status and details are returned.
